original_title: Subotnick: Portrait of an Electronic Music Pioneer
overview: Bio-documentary about revered avant-garde music composer, and electronic music pioneer, Morton Subotnick. Through a series of candid interviews and illuminating conversations with key figures from his past and present, "Subotnick" provides an overview of this fascinating composerâ€™s rich life and uncompromising career.
title: Subotnick: Portrait of an Electronic Music Pioneer
